start.text: Time to make some new friends.
Anything moves, it's going to get it.
Let's focus on the bad guys.
Hope these shitheads know what they're in for.
Someone's looking to cash their chips early.
Looks like someone wants to be neighborly.
*Gulp* All right, now for some ass-kicking.

start_boss.text: Sure hope you know what you're doing.
What the hell is this shit?
Guess there's no turning back now.
Make sure you have a backup weapon, that thing won't go down easy.
Gonna be a bad day for somebody.

retreat.text: Me and courage are out of here.
They want me, they'll have to catch me.
Why the hell do I follow you into things like this?
Blood's running, and I'm going to follow.

engaged.text: I'll put a nail in your head.
You're just in time for your ass-whipping.
I'm going to knock you off your axles.
I'm going to put you down.

pursuing.text: Could use a little target practice.
Line the bottles up, I'm ready.
Gonna kill you for wasting my time.
Should've run, now say your prayers.
So what, we chase those little cocksuckers down or what?
Yeah, better run. Uh, them, not us.

hull_90.text: Feeling a little worse for wear.
Fat's in the fire now, you little bitch.
That's how you wanna play, huh?

hull_50.text: Not firing on all pistons here!
A toolbox and some whiskey, if you don't mind.

hull_30.text: Too stupid to die... but getting there.
If I'm going to die, at least pass me some whiskey.

overload.text: Oh god, I think I'm going to be sick...

death.text: Don't let them bury me in -

victory.text: You know, you put up a good fight. I'm impressed.
Not many people in my company could have done what you did.
Sure put a nail in that one.
Makes me wonder how much more I can settle with guns.
Killing never felt so good, could almost hear the dead behind me guiding my hand.
All right, let's get this fleet rolling.
Hope they're in hell right now, blinking, trying to figure out where they fucked up.
Glad we iced those little fuckers.
Let's see what we can find. Might be something in the wreckage.
You don't fuck with the one who brings you your mail.

victory_boss.text: Feel more alive than I ever have.
